sentences.en: A spiritless tenacity was his main characteristic, I judged.
sentences.cn: 我估量他性格的主要特征是一种冷冰冰的韧劲.

sentences.en: But it is still commendable for its determination and tenacity.
sentences.cn: 不过它有这样的决心和毅力,却是难能可贵的.

sentences.en: But they knew also the Chairman's domineering temper and tenacity.
sentences.cn: 可是他们也知道董事长的脾气就是那样专断,那样执拗.

sentences.en: Chicken legs , chicken claws , laudatory title, rich in colloid, with tenacity.
sentences.cn: 凤爪是鸡脚爪的美称, 含丰富胶质, 有韧劲.

sentences.en: Fiber convolutions also correlate negatively with such physical measurements as bundle tenacity.
sentences.cn: 天然转曲对成纱强力可能比对纤维束强力起着更大的直接作用.

sentences.en: Fiber convolutions also negatively with such physical measurements as bundle tenacity.
sentences.cn: 光纤转曲也与束强力等物理测量有着副关联.

sentences.en: High strength, good rigidity and tenacity, good heat and seawater resisting, good Cl resisting, suitable for high performance products.
sentences.cn: 高机械强度，高耐热性，韧性好，具有较好的耐海水、耐氯性。适用于高性能制品。

sentences.en: His Methods : Were all stamped with tenacity of purpose, with originality and ingenuity.
sentences.cn: 他的业绩表明他坚韧不拔,富有创建, 足智多谋.

sentences.en: In any event, Walters saved our March 16 trip with the imagination and tenacity.
sentences.cn: 不管怎样, 沃尔特斯以他的想象力和不屈不挠的意志使我们3月16日的旅行化险为夷.

sentences.en: Manufacturers of high tenacity and fine denier multifilament polypropylene yarns.
sentences.cn: 制造高韧性和细旦丙纶复丝纱线.

sentences.en: She clung to this sum with a tenacity that was surprising.
sentences.cn: 她拼命捏住这笔钱不放,这种倔劲儿真是不可思议.

sentences.en: Talent, hard work and sheer tenacity are all crucial to career success.
sentences.cn: 事业要成功，才能、勤奋和顽强的意志都至关重要。

sentences.en: Tenacity is the bridge to success.
The athletes displayed great tenacity throughout the contest.
sentences.cn: 运动员在比赛中表现出坚韧的斗志.

sentences.en: The chief distinguishing feature is their tenacity of life.
sentences.cn: 其主要特征就是他们生命力之坚强.

sentences.en: The coating has good tenacity and wearability.
sentences.cn: 涂层具有良好的韧性和耐磨性能。

sentences.en: Their innate tenacity is one of their greatest assets, though.
sentences.cn: 其内在的韧性是他们最大的资产之一。

sentences.en: With a color freedom, plasticity, fine tenacity, easy to erosion, durable advantages.
sentences.cn: 具有配色自由, 可塑性强, 细腻坚韧, 不易剥蚀, 经久耐用的优点.

words.tran_cn: 顽强的；坚韧的；固执的；紧握的；黏着力强的

trans.tran_cn: [物]韧性，韧度，固执，坚持，不屈不挠，黏性
trans.tran_en: If you have tenacity, you are very determined and do not give up easily
